story.storykicker: The trailer reveals that Achcham Yenbadhu Madamaiyada is an action-packed road film. AR Rahman's terrific BGM has complemented the actioner.
story.storybody:
The trailer of Simbu's upcoming film Achcham Yenbadhu Madamaiyada was released on Wednesday. The second film of Simbu-Gautham duo, unlike their previous venture- Vinnai Thandi Varuvaya, is an actioner in most part.

The trailer reveals that Achcham Yenbadhu Madamaiyada is a road film. AR Rahman's BGM has complemented the action-packed trailer. The scenic and picturesque visuals in the film are typical traits of Gautham Vasudev Menon.

The film also stars Baba Sehgal, Daniel Balaji and Sathish in pivotal roles.

Two singles of the film- Showkali and Thalli Pogathey- have already received positive response from the audience.

The film has been in the making for the past 3 years, and has gone through many changes including the title. The Simbu-starrer was first named Sattendru Maarudhu Vaanilai, but later it was changed to the current name.
